casebody.data:
Monday, May 17, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

99-245. Schumacher v. Kreiner.

Hamilton App. No. C-980188. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County. Upon consideration of the motion for admission pro hac vice of R. Christian Macke,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for admission pro hac vice be, and hereby is, granted.
